item.title: Bio
item.description: Jordan Duabe — @j4ckofalltrades I’m a programmer, Linux geek, and command-line ninja from the ðŸ‡µðŸ‡­ (now based in ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡º). I loved video games (still do) as a kid and that’s what got me into computers, programming, and tech in general. I’ve been a software engineer for the past couple of years with experience in web and mobile app development in a variety of programming languages and frameworks. I’ve also picked up some DevOps skills and tricks over the years; from writing shell scripts to setting up CI/CD pipelines.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Happy Halloween ðŸŽƒ ðŸ¦‡ ðŸ‘» Obligatory first post while getting everything set up, as you’ve probably seen in the blog footer this website is powered by Hugo with the Hugo-Coder theme and is hosted on GitHub. It’s really nice not having to worry about stylesheets and layouts because I have close to zero design skills and being able to just write stuff in Markdown is great. Not really sure why I wanted to start a blog ðŸ¤” but here we are.
